snippet: Maximo Caminero, a 51-year-old artist from the Dominican Republic, will be on probation for 18 months, after what he called “an act of solidarity” with Ai Weiwei.
abstract: Artist Maximo Caminero pleads guilty to criminal mischief for dropping a vase by Chinese artist Ai Weiwei on floor of Perez Art Museum Miami as part of protest, and is sentenced to 19 months probation and 100 hours of community service; must also pay restitution.
lead_paragraph: Maximo Caminero, a 51-year-old artist from the Dominican Republic, will be on probation for 18 months, after what he called “an act of solidarity” with Ai Weiwei.

headline.main: Man Gets Probation in Attack on Ai Weiwei Vase
headline.print_headline: Man Gets Probation in Attack on Ai Weiwei Vase

keywords.value: Perez, Jorge M, Art Museum of Miami-Dade County
keywords.name: organizations
